body:
#### PR description:

* Add extra check to on DOM document validity
* Remove legacy schemas from the XML tests
* Cleanup tests
* Modify `runTest.sh` script to `cmsRun` all existing tests named `test*.py` or placed there in the future

@bsunanda - there were two xml files for the HGCal algo  tests that were not referenced elsewhere. I've removed them from the `DetectorDescription` package. Please, put them to an appropriate HGCal subsystem. Thanks.

@cvuosalo - <strike>please, confirm it cures the segfault you observe.</strike> Thanks.
